translations: 口是心非；表里不一；不诚实

sentences.sentence: Malcolm believed he was guilty of duplicity in his private dealings.
sentences.translation: 马尔科姆相信他在为其私底下行为的奸诈内疚着。

sentences.sentence: We are very good at duplicity and hope each other can be perceived.
sentences.translation: 我们都很擅长口是心非，又都很希望对方能有所察觉。

sentences.sentence: For sheer duplicity there is no one to beat - the British! May the fleas of a thousand camels infest their armpits!
sentences.translation: 但愿一千只骆驼上的跳蚤都寄生在英国人的腋下！
